name: overeducated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
more educated than is necessary or helpful: We are an over-educated country, pressurising all our young people into university degrees. In most social situations, I feel ridiculously overeducated. Related word
overeducate
More examplesFewer examplesThere are many overeducated graduates working in jobs that do not require graduate skills.It's the typical situation of being over-educated and under-employed.We worried that if we homeschooled the kids, they might be isolated and overeducated. Teachers claim they are overeducated and underpaid.
